name: Arnie vs. Aliens
description:
Somewhere in probably near future alien invasion occurs. Only one man can stop them and save the world. Of course he starts in America. 

------- 
Game is pretty short, just one procedurally generated level for you to beat. There is score counter, later I might code some highscore table for it, for now I will be glad for some High Scores in comments :) 

Thanks to the theme game should be pretty easy to learn, as it has only 2 buttons for control :) 

I developed the game alone during all three days. In last few hours AwesomeA and Guby came to help me finding sounds and improve my placeholder graphics, and I really appreciate it. 

Hope you all enjoy it :)

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=56123
